{{Lang|'''Otogi Wood'''|ja=御伽材|ja_rm=Otogi-zai}} is a type of [[Wood]] that is obtained by cutting down Otogi Trees. It is an item used to craft [[furnishings]].

==Locations==
Otogi Wood can be found on [[Yashiori Island]].

It is also common on [[Narukami Island]], on the larger island of [[Kannazuka]], and in [[Watatsumi Island]].

==Craft Usage==
{{Craft Usage}}

==Other Uses==
* 10 Otogi Wood are used in the daily commission [[To Make a Cat Carving]].

==Trivia==
* In-universe, the name "Otogi tree" means "the tree that keeps one company." This originates from nursery rhymes which portray the tree as the "whisper of nature."<ref>Tutorial: [[Tutorials/Collecting Wood|Collecting Wood]]</ref>
* According to the description of [[Camp Bonfire: Glorious Clarity]], the Otogi tree has essential oils in it which can be used to repel mosquitos.
